camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: If true, the CloudWatch client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.useProfileCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: Set whether the Timestream client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.useSessionCredentials
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: Set whether the Timestream client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in situation in which the user needs to assume a IAM role for doing operations in Timestream.

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.profileCredentialsName
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter sets the profile name.

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.sessionToken
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume a IAM role.

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..name: camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-timestream-query-sink..description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.
